android.widget
类 GridView

java.lang.Object
  android.view.View
      android.view.ViewGroup
          android.widget.AdapterView<ListAdapter>
              android.widget.AbsListView
                  android.widget.GridView
所有已实现的接口：
Drawable.Callback, NoCopySpan, TextWatcher, KeyEvent.Callback, ViewManager, ViewParent, ViewTreeObserver.OnGlobalLayoutListener, ViewTreeObserver.OnTouchModeChangeListener, Filter.FilterListener
public class GridView
extends AbsListView

A view that shows items in two-dimensional scrolling grid. The items in the grid come from the ListAdapter associated with this view.

方法详细信息

getAdapter

public ListAdapter getAdapter()
从类 AdapterView 复制的描述
Returns the adapter currently associated with this widget.

指定者：
类 AdapterView<ListAdapter> 中的 getAdapter
返回：
The adapter used to provide this view's content.

setAdapter

public void setAdapter(ListAdapter adapter)
Sets the data behind this GridView.

指定者：
类 AdapterView<ListAdapter> 中的 setAdapter
参数：
adapter - the adapter providing the grid's data

setSelection

public void setSelection(int position)
Sets the currently selected item

指定者：
类 AdapterView<ListAdapter> 中的 setSelection
参数：
position - Index (starting at 0) of the data item to be selected. If in touch mode, the item will not be selected but it will still be positioned appropriately.

onKeyDown

public boolean onKeyDown(int keyCode,
                         KeyEvent event)
从类 View 复制的描述
Default implementation of KeyEvent.Callback.onKeyMultiple(): perform press of the view when KeyEvent.KEYCODE_DPAD_CENTER or KeyEvent.KEYCODE_ENTER is released, if the view is enabled and clickable.

指定者：
接口 KeyEvent.Callback 中的 onKeyDown
覆盖：
类 View 中的 onKeyDown
参数：
keyCode - A key code that represents the button pressed, from KeyEvent.
event - The KeyEvent object that defines the button action.
返回：
If you handled the event, return true. If you want to allow the event to be handled by the next receiver, return false.

onKeyMultiple

public boolean onKeyMultiple(int keyCode,
                             int repeatCount,
                             KeyEvent event)
从类 View 复制的描述
Default implementation of KeyEvent.Callback.onKeyMultiple(): always returns false (doesn't handle the event).

指定者：
接口 KeyEvent.Callback 中的 onKeyMultiple
覆盖：
类 View 中的 onKeyMultiple
参数：
keyCode - A key code that represents the button pressed, from KeyEvent.
repeatCount - The number of times the action was made.
event - The KeyEvent object that defines the button action.
返回：
If you handled the event, return true. If you want to allow the event to be handled by the next receiver, return false.

onKeyUp

public boolean onKeyUp(int keyCode,
                       KeyEvent event)
从类 View 复制的描述
Default implementation of KeyEvent.Callback.onKeyMultiple(): perform clicking of the view when KeyEvent.KEYCODE_DPAD_CENTER or KeyEvent.KEYCODE_ENTER is released.

指定者：
接口 KeyEvent.Callback 中的 onKeyUp
覆盖：
类 AbsListView 中的 onKeyUp
参数：
keyCode - A key code that represents the button pressed, from KeyEvent.
event - The KeyEvent object that defines the button action.
返回：
If you handled the event, return true. If you want to allow the event to be handled by the next receiver, return false.

setGravity

public void setGravity(int gravity)
Describes how the child views are horizontally aligned. Defaults to Gravity.LEFT

参数：
gravity - the gravity to apply to this grid's children

setHorizontalSpacing

public void setHorizontalSpacing(int horizontalSpacing)
Set the amount of horizontal (x) spacing to place between each item in the grid.

参数：
horizontalSpacing - The amount of horizontal space between items, in pixels.

setVerticalSpacing

public void setVerticalSpacing(int verticalSpacing)
Set the amount of vertical (y) spacing to place between each item in the grid.

参数：
verticalSpacing - The amount of vertical space between items, in pixels.

setStretchMode

public void setStretchMode(int stretchMode)
Control how items are stretched to fill their space.

参数：
stretchMode - Either NO_STRETCH, STRETCH_SPACING, STRETCH_SPACING_UNIFORM, or STRETCH_COLUMN_WIDTH.

getStretchMode

public int getStretchMode()

setColumnWidth

public void setColumnWidth(int columnWidth)
Set the width of columns in the grid.

参数：
columnWidth - The column width, in pixels.

setNumColumns

public void setNumColumns(int numColumns)
Set the number of columns in the grid

参数：
numColumns - The desired number of columns.
